ai-mil7.5.4:1.1_0: “Having taken up the elephant driver’s belly, what belongs to one box, what is that one year?”
ai-mil7.5.4:1.2_0: “After the fingers, great king, it’s not concealed,
ai-mil7.5.4:1.3_0: In the same way, a wise person who understands and knows assemblies should be known by the knowledge and vision of freedom.
ai-mil7.5.4:1.5_0: When you have spoken, great king, the senior monk Upasena of Vaṅganta
ai-mil7.5.4:2.4_0: and hard for rebirth in the future.’”
ai-mil7.5.4:3.1_0: The fourth part of an split openness.
